bibl.title: Penthemeros-Certificates in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn P.J., Penthemeros-Certificates in Graeco-Roman Egypt. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XII.)

C.R. par Danielle Bonneau, RD 4e s., 43 (1965) pp. 99-101. - Eva Cantarella, Iura 16 (1965) pp. 391-395. - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 44 (1964) pp. 115-116. - Edmond Van't Dack, BibO 22 (1965) pp. 277-278. - Danielle Bonneau, REg 18 (1966) p. 224. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 39 (1964) Nos 77-78, pp. 220-224.
